resources.string:
Introducing "Au Fait" - the ultimate fashion and beauty app for women. Discover a curated selection of trendy clothing, shoes, makeup, and skincare products, all in one place. Our intuitive interface makes it easy to find the perfect items tailored to your style and preferences.With "Au Fait," you can confidently explore, shop, and express your unique sense of fashion. Whether you are looking for the latest fashion trends or high-quality beauty essentials, we have got you covered.Enjoy a seamless and personalized shopping experience with our recommendations tailored just for you. Shop with confidence using our secure payment system, and have your items delivered right to your doorstep.
Join us in revolutionizing the way women explore, purchase, and engage with fashion and beauty. Discover your style, enhance your natural beauty, and embrace self-expression with "Au Fait."
Download now and start your transformative fashion and beauty journey with "Au Fait."
Developed by Parveen Siddiqa and Syeda Afsa Tamim

The "Au Fait" app may include the use of open-source software libraries or other third-party components, which are subject to their respective licenses. We acknowledge and appreciate the contributions of the following projects:

- Picasso by Square, Inc.
 License: Apache License 2.0
 GitHub: https://github.com/square/picasso

- Retrofit by Square, Inc.
 License: Apache License 2.0
 GitHub: https://github.com/square/retrofit

- Gson by Google
 License: Apache License 2.0
 GitHub: https://github.com/google/gson

- Glide by Bumptech
 License: BSD, part MIT and Apache 2.0
 GitHub: https://github.com/bumptech/glide

- Firebase by Google
 License: Apache License 2.0
 Website: https://firebase.google.com/terms
